name: Slime Masters (Mab0r0shi)
description:
A town must be protected from approaching monsters. Select the hero of your choice, level them up, acquire powers, and cleanse the world of evil.

Game current features:
-4 playable characters with different starter stats
-15 in-game upgrades
-6 permanent upgrades
-A saving system that allows you to continue your game in the next session and carry on for the following game update
-And much more that It's yours to discover

Mab0r0shi created the core gameplay for the OpenGameArt's Summer Game Jam 2022, and still working on it as a solo developer.


Feel free to PLAY, share, and leave your feedback.
Game Link: https://mab0r0shi.itch.io/slimemasters


Enjoy,
Mab0r0shi

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

WASD for movements
Left Mouse Button to throw one of your available slime
Right Mouse Button to perform the character attack or ability
